data.name: RedirectingToRunAsRDUser
data.value: {0} 是 Win32 GUI 程式。正在重新導向以遠端使用者身份執行...
data.comment: Message shown when program the user wants to run is detected to be a GUI program, which need to run as a user account, not SYSTEM.

data.name: RedirectingUWPToRunAs
data.value: {0} 是一個可在容器中執行的 UWP 應用程式。正在重新導向以在容器中作爲遠端使用者執行...

data.name: RunningGuiAsSystemWarning
data.value: 警告: {0} 是 Win32 GUI 程式。它可能無法正確地以系統方式執行
data.comment: Message shown when program the user wants to run is detected to be a GUI program, but the code to run as a user account is not present on the device.

data.name: ContainerConnected
data.value: Factory Orchestrator Service 已連線到執行相容版本之 Factory Orchestrator Service 的容器。
data.comment: container refers to a Windows container running on the host device (eg https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/virtualization/windowscontainers/about/)

data.name: ContainerDisconnected
data.value: Factory Orchestrator Service 已與執行相容版本之 Factory Orchestrator Service 的容器中斷連線。
data.comment: container refers to a Windows container running on the host device (eg https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/virtualization/windowscontainers/about/)

data.name: IpcInvalidOperationError
data.value: Factory Orchestrator 服務無法辨識命令！這很可能是因為用戶端與服務的版本不相符。
data.comment: Error when service does not recognize a command from client. Almost always due to using an older client with a newer service.

data.name: Unknown
data.value: 未知

data.name: ContainerConnectionFailed
data.value: 無法連線到容器內的 Factory Orchestrator 服務!
data.comment: Error thrown if we cannot connect to the service inside the container for any reason
